{{also|oktober|október|Ɔktober}} ==Afrikaans== ===Noun=== {{af-noun|Oktobermaande}} # [[October]] [[Category:af:Months]] ---- ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ɔkˈtoːbɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Oktober.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Oktobers|gen2=Oktober|Oktober}} # [[October]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|s|}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Oktoberfest}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Months]] ---- ==Indonesian== {{wikipedia|lang=id}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|id|nl|oktober}}, from {{der|id|la|octōber||eighth month}}, from {{der|id|la|octō||eight}}, from {{der|id|ine-pro|*oḱtṓw||twice four}}. October was the eighth month in the Roman calendar. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|id|/ɔk̚.ˈto.bər/}} * {{hyphenation|id|Ok|to|bêr}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|id|proper noun|head=Oktobêr}} # [[October]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{Months in Indonesian}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:KBBI Daring}} [[Category:id:Gregorian calendar months]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/okˈtoːbɐ/}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|lb|proper noun|g=m}} # [[October]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/lb}} ---- ==Malay== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|ms|اوکتوبر|sc=Arab}} ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|en|ms}} {{m|en|October}}, from {{etyl|enm|ms}}, from {{etyl|ang|ms}}, from {{etyl|la|ms}} {{m|la|octōber}}, from {{m|la|octō}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|ms}} {{m|ine-pro|*oḱtṓw}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|ms|[ɔktobə(r)]}} * {{rhymes|ms|bə(r)|ə(r)}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|ms|proper noun|Jawi spelling|اوکتوبر}} # [[October]] {{gloss|tenth month of the Gregorian calendar}} [[Category:ms:Gregorian calendar months]]
